Bibliography

course bibliography and references for COMP 424

The course bibliography & references will be updated on a weekly basis with suggested reading, which will reflect each week’s course notes and lecture.

References will be cited at the end of each week’s notes.

There is no specific textbook for this course.

Week 3 - 28th January 2019
  • JS Info - DOM Nodes
  • MDN - Global Attributes
  • MDN - HTML developer guide
  • MDN - HTML5
  • MDN - requestAnimationFrame
  • W3C Documentation - HTML5
  • W3 Schools - HTML5
Week 2 - 21st January 2019
  • N/A
Week 1 - 14th January 2019
  • Jaffe, Jim., Application Foundations For The Open Web Platform. W3C. 10.14.2014. http://www.w3.org/blog/2014/10/application-foundations-for-the-open-web-platform/
  • MDN - Using Dynamic Styling Information
  • W3C Documentation - HTML Syntax
